name: Rock Dodge (AdrianGomez)
description:
-Summary-

In Rock Dodge, you play as a mouse trying to survive an incoming rock avalanche. The goal of this game is to survive as much as possible without getting killed.

-How to Play-

To control the mouse, you can use either to left and right arrow keys or the W and D key. Every 5 rocks you dodge you score a point. The speed of the rocks depends on the size of it which vary between small and big. Smaller rocks deal less damage than big rocks. As time passes, the speed of the rocks increases as well as the amount that spawn.
